nodes.text: The Cheku system was a star system that was located within the Brevost sector, a part of the Expansion Region and the Trailing Sectors region. It was the origin point of the group known as the Chekut.

The Cheku system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square O-15. Within the book, the Cheku system was erroneously placed in grid square O-14 on a map depicting the events of the Confederation–Galactic Alliance War.
